meanings.sent1: The glitchiest game I played crashed every few minutes.
meanings.sent2: This computer is the glitchiest one in the office.
meanings.sent3: The glitchiest elevator in the building always stops between floors.
meanings.sent4: Her day was like the glitchiest video game, full of unexpected errors.
meanings.sent5: The glitchiest software made it impossible to finish the project on time.

meanings.sent1: The glitchiest device in the house is the old printer.

meanings.sent4: His life felt like the glitchiest movie, with unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The glitchiest road always caused delays during rush hour.
